tha-ap271:1.4_0: for those who are steady in ethics.
tha-ap271:2.1_0: compassionate for one, who is compassionate,
tha-ap271:2.2_0: He has crossed over the world.
tha-ap271:3.1_0: That great hero has gone forth
tha-ap271:3.4_0: I pay homage to the Teacher.
tha-ap271:4.2_0: to bow to the supreme among men.
tha-ap271:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap271:4.4_0: And this is the fruit and result.
tha-ap271:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap271:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Buddhāvāja.
tha-ap271:7.1_0: newly gone forth of the Seru, the ninth Gods.
